jjjooo233 发表于 2020-3-22 14:59
抱歉没看到23333
暂时应该没办法做到  这款插件我不是很了解
不过直接用java写应该是可以的 ...
整个skript-mirror直接写java呗
import:
    com.github.intellectualsites.plotsquared.plot.object.PlotPlayer

on rightclick:
    send ""
    send "<lime>[ &f%now%<lime> ]&f<silver>[ &f%time%<silver> ]&f"
    send "[<aqua>api&f]%raw PlotPlayer%"
    set {_playerUUID} to player.getUniqueId()
    send "[<green>player uuid&f] %{_playerUUID}%"
    set {_PlotPlayer} to PlotPlayer.wrap({_playerUUID})
    send "[<pink>id&f]: %{_PlotPlayer}%"
    set {_PlotUser} to {_PlotPlayer}.getCurrentPlot().getOwner()
    send "[<orange>owner uuid&f]: %{_PlotUser}%"
    if {_PlotUser} = {_playerUUID}:
        send "欢迎回家"
    else:
        send "yooooooo~"
